00038 int main( int argc, char** argv ) {
00039 
00040         try{
00041                 //test if the config file is passed in
00042                 if(argc < 2) {
00043                         //if not print exit message and die
00044                         cout << "Usage: " << argv[0] << " file.ini" << endl;
00045                         exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00046                 }else {
00047                         //if so load the config file
00048                         YClopsConfiguration::setConfigFile(string(argv[1]));
00049                 }
00050 
00051                 of.open("dump.txt");
00052 
00053                 //Set up logging
00054                 //Log::SetLogFile(&of);
00055                 Log::SetLogFile(&cout);
00056                 Log::SetReportLevel(loggingLevel);
00057                 Log::SetTimeStampDisplay(false);
00058                 Log::SetReportStreamBits(ALL_LOG&(~(WII_LOG)));
00059                 //Log::SetReportStreamBits(ALL_LOG);
00060                 Log::GetOStream()->precision(10);
00061 
00062                 //Set up the SIGUSR1 so we know when a button is pressed
00063                 LOG(DEBUG4) << "Initializing signals" << endl;
00064                 signal(SIGUSR1, signal_handler);
00065                 signal(SIGINT, signal_handler);
00066 
00067                 //Initialize the WiiController
00068                 LOG(DEBUG4) << "Creating the Wii Controller" << endl;
00069                 WiiController::create();
00070 
00071                 yclops = new YClopsReactiveNavInterface();
00072                 yclops->useNullMotorCommand();
00073                 ai = new mrpt::reactivenav::YclopsNavigationSystem(*yclops, false,false);
00074                 ai->loadConfigFile(YClopsConfiguration::instance(), YClopsConfiguration::instance());
00075 
00076                 mrpt::poses::CPose2D curPose;
00077                 mrpt::slam::CSimplePointsMap map;
00078                 float curV, curW;
00079 
00080                 while(!closing) {
00081 
00082                         LOG(DEBUG4) << "Running CurrentPose and Speeds" << endl;
00083                         yclops->getCurrentPoseAndSpeeds(curPose, curV, curW);
00084                         LOG(DEBUG) << "Running change speeds" << endl;
00085                         yclops->changeSpeeds(curV, curW);
00086                         LOG(DEBUG) << "Running senseObstacles" << endl;

00090                         {
00091                                 usleep(1000000/20);

00093                         }

00095                         */
00096                         LOG(DEBUG) << "CurPose: (" << curPose.x() << "," << curPose.y() << "," << curPose.phi()*180./M_PI << ")" << endl;
00097 
00098                 }
00099         } catch (...) {
00100                 closing = false; //We are closing but we close with an error see the shutdown call below
00101         }
00102 
00103         shutdown((closing?EXIT_SUCCESS:EXIT_FAILURE));
00104 
00105         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00106 }

00108 void signal_handler( int signum ) {
00109 
00110         if( SIGINT == signum ) {
00111                 LOG(DEBUG4) << " Signal Received " << signum << endl;
00112                 if( NULL != yclops ) {
00113                         shutdown(EXIT_FAILURE);
00114                 }
00115         } else if( SIGUSR1 == signum ) {
00116                 uint16_t cbuttons = 0;
00117                 uint16_t lax = 0, lay = 0;
00118                 uint16_t rax = 0, ray = 0;
00119                 uint16_t la = 0;

00121                 uint16_t mbuttons = 0;

00125                 controller->getClassicButtons(cbuttons);
00126                 controller->getLeftStick(lax,lay);

00128                 controller->getLeftAnalog(la);
00129                 controller->getRightAnalog(ra);
00130                 controller->getMoteButtons(mbuttons);
00131 
00132                 if( cbuttons & CLASSIC_D_UP ) {
00133                         LOG(INFO) << "Toggling camera data" << endl;
00134                         yclops->toggleCameraDump();
00135                 }
00136 
00137                 if( cbuttons & CLASSIC_D_DOWN ) {
00138                         LOG(INFO) << "Toggling lidar data" << endl;
00139                         yclops->toggleLidarDump();
00140                 }

00142                 if( cbuttons & CLASSIC_D_LEFT ) {
00143                         LOG(INFO) << "Toggling GPS data" << endl;

00154                         yclops->setAutonomusMode();
00155                         ai->setChallenge(false);
00156                         string pointsFile = YClopsConfiguration::instance().read_string("ROBOT_NAME","POINTS_FILE","points.txt");
00157                         ai->setFileName(pointsFile,false);
00158                         ai->setup();
00159                 }

00173                         yclops->setIdle();
00174                         ai->stop();

00176

00188                         LOG(INFO) << "Toggling Encoder data" << endl;

00190                 }

00194                 }

00196                 if( cbuttons & CLASSIC_R2 ) {
00197                         LOG_WII(DEBUG4) << "Classic R2" << endl;
00198                 }
00199 
00200                 if( cbuttons & CLASSIC_SELECT ) {
00201                         switch(loggingLevel) {
00202                         case DISABLE:                                                   break;
00203                         case FATAL:             loggingLevel = ERROR;   break;
00204                         case ERROR:             loggingLevel = WARNING; break;
00205                         case WARNING:   loggingLevel = INFO;    break;

00286 void shutdown( int exitStatus ) {
00287         LOG(INFO) << "Shutting down YClops" << endl;
00288         WiiController::destroyReference();

00290         //sleep(1);
